identification.rights: This hymn is in the public domain. You may freely use this score for personal and congregational worship. If you reproduce the score, please credit Hymnary.org as the source.

credit.credit-words: This hymn is in the public domain. You may freely use this score for personal and congregational worship. If you reproduce the score, please credit Hymnary.org as the source.
Text: Samuel Longfellow, 1864, alt. Tune: Orlando Gibbons, 1623

direction-type.words: still this restless heart of mine.
Speak to calm this tossing sea,
gladden now this heart of mine.
In the desert ways I sing—
